subject: RE: [junit] Getting the Testing Bug
msgSnippet: ... Hi Mike, Thanks, man.  This looks great.  I forwarded it to our dev and QA teams here. Best, Scott Stirling Workscape, Inc.
messageBody:
> From: Mike Clark [mailto:mike@...]
>
> Howdy,
>
> It's probably preaching to the choir on this list, but java.net has
> published my article titled "A Dozen Ways to Get the Testing
> Bug in the
> New Year":
>
> http://today.java.net/pub/a/today/2004/01/22/DozenWays.html

Hi Mike,

Thanks, man. This looks great. I forwarded it to our dev and QA teams here.

Best,
Scott Stirling
Workscape, Inc.
